class.name: LimboDebugger
class.brief_description: Sends runtime data to LimboAI debugger session.

method.name: register_bt_instance
method.description: Registers a [BehaviorTree] instance, so it can be inspected in the debugger. Can be used in custom BT player implementations.

method.name: unregister_bt_instance
method.description: Unregisters a [BehaviorTree] instance with the debugger.
